safetyTips: All of our furniture will be supplied suitably packaged and handed over contact-free at the doorstep. If assistance is needed to position or install the product we will be wearing gloves and masks, and keep at least 2 metres away.
name: in_fill | Made to Measure Desks
description: Bespoke, made to measure desks, and storage solutions. Delivered contact-free to your door for self-assembly or professionally installed while observing social distancing. Whether you're after a simple plywood desk or a more bespoke creation with drawers and cable management, we are here to help you work from home in comfort. We stock a range of materials and finishes and can help you customise your product to fit your home and make your WFH environment a pleasurable and comfortable space.
